verses.verse: Come near<WH7126>, ye nations<WH1471>, to hear<WH8085>; and hearken<WH7181>, ye people<WH3816>: let the earth<WH776> hear<WH8085>, and all that is therein<WH4393>; the world<WH8398>, and all things that come forth<WH6631> of it. all that: Heb. the fulness thereof

For the indignation<WH7110> of the LORD<WH3068> is upon all nations<WH1471>, and his fury<WH2534> upon all their armies<WH6635>: he hath utterly destroyed<WH2763> them, he hath delivered<WH5414> them to the slaughter<WH2874>.

Their slain<WH2491> also shall be cast out<WH7993>, and their stink<WH889> shall come up<WH5927> out of their carcases<WH6297>, and the mountains<WH2022> shall be melted<WH4549> with their blood<WH1818>.

And all the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> shall be dissolved<WH4743>, and the heavens<WH8064> shall be rolled together<WH1556> as a scroll<WH5612>: and all their host<WH6635> shall fall down<WH5034>, as the leaf<WH5929> falleth off<WH5034> from the vine<WH1612>, and as a falling<WH5034> fig from the fig tree<WH8384>.
For my sword<WH2719> shall be bathed<WH7301> in heaven<WH8064>: behold, it shall come down<WH3381> upon Idumea<WH123>, and upon the people<WH5971> of my curse<WH2764>, to judgment<WH4941>.

The sword<WH2719> of the LORD<WH3068> is filled<WH4390> with blood<WH1818>, it is made fat<WH1878> with fatness<WH2459>, and with the blood<WH1818> of lambs<WH3733> and goats<WH6260>, with the fat<WH2459> of the kidneys<WH3629> of rams<WH352>: for the LORD<WH3068> hath a sacrifice<WH2077> in Bozrah<WH1224>, and a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH2874> in the land<WH776> of Idumea<WH123>.

And the unicorns<WH7214> shall come down<WH3381> with them, and the bullocks<WH6499> with the bulls<WH47>; and their land<WH776> shall be soaked<WH7301> with blood<WH1818>, and their dust<WH6083> made fat<WH1878> with fatness<WH2459>. unicorns: or, rhinocerots soaked: or, drunken
For it is the day<WH3117> of the LORD'S<WH3068> vengeance<WH5359>, and the year<WH8141> of recompences<WH7966> for the controversy<WH7379> of Zion<WH6726>.

And the streams<WH5158> thereof shall be turned<WH2015> into pitch<WH2203>, and the dust<WH6083> thereof into brimstone<WH1614>, and the land<WH776> thereof shall become burning<WH1197> pitch<WH2203>.

It shall not be quenched<WH3518> night<WH3915> nor day<WH3119>; the smoke<WH6227> thereof shall go up<WH5927> for ever<WH5769>: from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> it shall lie waste<WH2717>; none shall pass through<WH5674> it for ever<WH5331> and ever<WH5331>.

But the cormorant<WH6893> and the bittern<WH7090> shall possess<WH3423> it; the owl<WH3244> also and the raven<WH6158> shall dwell<WH7931> in it: and he shall stretch out<WH5186> upon it the line<WH6957> of confusion<WH8414>, and the stones<WH68> of emptiness<WH922>. cormorant: or, pelican
They shall call<WH7121> the nobles<WH2715> thereof to the kingdom<WH4410>, but none shall be there, and all her princes<WH8269> shall be nothing<WH657>.

And thorns<WH5518> shall come up<WH5927> in her palaces<WH759>, nettles<WH7057> and brambles<WH2336> in the fortresses<WH4013> thereof: and it shall be an habitation<WH5116> of dragons<WH8577>, and a court<WH2681> for owls<WH1323> <WH3284>. owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl

The wild beasts of the desert<WH6728> shall also meet<WH6298> with the wild beasts of the island<WH338>, and the satyr<WH8163> shall cry<WH7121> to his fellow<WH7453>; the screech owl<WH3917> also shall rest<WH7280> there, and find<WH4672> for herself a place of rest<WH4494>. The wilddesert: Heb. Ziim the wildisland: Heb. Ijim screech: or, night monster

There shall the great owl<WH7091> make her nest<WH7077>, and lay<WH4422>, and hatch<WH1234>, and gather<WH1716> under her shadow<WH6738>: there shall the vultures<WH1772> also be gathered<WH6908>, every one<WH802> with her mate<WH7468>.

Seek ye out<WH1875> of the book<WH5612> of the LORD<WH3068>, and read<WH7121>: no one<WH259> of these<WH2007> shall fail<WH5737>, none<WH802> shall want<WH6485> her mate<WH7468>: for my mouth<WH6310> it hath commanded<WH6680>, and his spirit<WH7307> it hath gathered<WH6908> them.

And he hath cast<WH5307> the lot<WH1486> for them, and his hand<WH3027> hath divided<WH2505> it unto them by line<WH6957>: they shall possess<WH3423> it for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> shall they dwell<WH7931> therein.
